front.title: IEEE Draft Standard Specifications for High-Voltage Expulsion, Current-Limiting and Combination Type Distribution and Power Class External Fuses, With Rated Voltages From 1 kV Through 38 kV, Used for the Protection of Shunt Capacitors

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard establishes specifications for high voltage (above 1000 volts) 1 distribution and power class expulsion, current-limiting and combination type external capacitor fuses and accessories, with rated voltages from 1 kV through 38 kV, for protecting shunt capacitors complying with IEEE 18 and NEMA CP 1. All of these devices are intended for use on alternating current systems. These fuses may be used with capacitor units, groups of units, or entire capacitor banks
